name: Agent Activity Timeline
tuple_notation: $T_{activity} = (Events, Timeline, Agents, Actions) : Agent 	imes Time 	o Activity_{log}$

name: Multimodal Input Fusion
tuple_notation: $F_{multi} = (I_{voice}, I_{gesture}, I_{screen}, E_{fusion}, Intent_{unified}) : Inputs \to Intent$

name: Approval Checkpoint
tuple_notation: $C_{approve} = (T_{checkpoint}, G_{preview}, UI_{approve}, Gate_{exec}) : Action_{critical} \to Approved \cup Rejected$

name: Collaboration Mode Switcher
tuple_notation: $M_{collab} = (Modes, T_{transition}, P_{state}, I_{mode}) : Mode \to \{AI\text{-}Centric, Human\text{-}Centric, Symbiotic\}$

name: Knowledge Graph Explorer
tuple_notation: $E_{graph} = (G, N_{focus}, Traverse, Filter, Layout) : KnowledgeGraph \to Exploration_{interactive}$

name: Auto-Updating Content
tuple_notation: $U_{auto} = (Content, Sources, Monitor, Update_{trigger}) : Document \times Time \to Document'$

name: Multi-Domain Dashboard
tuple_notation: $D_{multi} = (Domains, Metrics, Aggregation, Layout) : Set\langle Domain \rangle \to Dashboard$

name: Activity Feed
tuple_notation: $F_{activity} = (Events, Actors, Timestamps, Filter) : (Humans \cup Agents) \times Actions \to Feed$

name: Reset/Retrain Controls
tuple_notation: $R_{retrain} = (Model, Reset, Retrain, Confirm) : Model \to Model_{reset} \cup Model_{retrained}$
